name: Practitioner License or Other ID Number
description: This data type specifies a practitioners license number, or other ID number such as UPIN, Medicare and Medicaid number, and associated detail.

fields.name: Id Number
fields.description: Specifies the license number or other ID number such as UPIN, Medicare and Medicaid number.

fields.name: State/Other Qualifying Information
fields.description: Specifies the state or province in which the license or ID is valid, if relevant, or other qualifying information. It is recommended that state qualifications use the abbreviations from the postal service of the country.

fields.name: Expiration Date
fields.description: Specifies the date when the license or ID is no longer valid.
